source.name: Grid Layout test
source.instructions: We wrote some code to center the Send button in the third row of the grid layout. Can you fill in the blanks to complete the code?
source.text:
< Button ... 
     android:layout_width="wrap_content"
     android:layout_height="wrap_content"
     android:layout_row="<<<2>>>"
     android:layout_column="<<<0>>>"
     android:layout_gravity="<<<center_horizontal>>>"
     android:layout_columnSpan="<<<2>>>"
     android:text="@string/send" />
</GridLayout>
